author: brane
msg: Move the expected location of the SQLite amalgamation directory from
the source tree root ($abs_srcdir) to subversion/include/private, thus
making it less likely that, in an amalgamated build, other SQLite
files will be found on the path before the amalgamated ones.
* build/ac-macros/sqlite.m4: Search for SQLite amalgamation in
* get-deps.sh: Move the unpacked amalgamation tarball to that location.

author: mschmalle
msg: - added actionscript layer to app, target, emitters and writers to allow for as code testing
- added TestPackage for preliminary package/class production
